div.p: In this scenario, we look into how to manage the s with the system.

The in the context of this scenario does not refer strictly to a safety risk (such as fall risk or fire risk), but encompasses a much broader family of risks (such as concrete cracking, which is an economic risk, but not necessarily a safety risk).
This scenario is split into two sub-scenarios by the respective phase:

ul.li: which covers how the risk management plan is created during the planning, and

li.phase: which looks into how the risks are tracked, mitigated and escalated during the construction.

test.p: Record 3 complete states of the whole system and freeze them.
Check that the output of the system coincides with the manually computed analytics.
